name: SPARES
comment: Repair Damage 1:1

name: PEOPLE
comment: are used to colonize. POP grows at 10% on ships

name: MONEY
comment: is what you spend to buy things

name: SHIELDS
comment: Stops 3 pts of damage per .1 of energy spent

name: ARMOR
comment: Stops 5 pts of damage. Flat Rate

name: MISSLES
comment: Causes 10pts of damage per shot fired

name: DRONES
comment: Collects a set amount of ore per turn

name: CR FRAME
comment: This is the basis of yoru ship

name: SCANNER
comment: Shows map in a 5x5 grid with you in center

name: ENGINES
comment: Provide 5 points of energy per engine

name: ORE
comment: Basic Ore Sells for 1 unit of MONEY

name: CARGO HULL
comment: Extend the capacity of your ship by 10000 ore

name: MINE FIELD
comment: Lay a damage field in a sector.

name: LASER
comment: Causes 2 pts of dam per .1 of energy expended

name: FACTORY 1
comment: Produces Items up to size 1

name: FACTORY 2
comment: Produces Items up to size 2

name: FACTORY 3
comment: Produces Items up to size 3

name: ENH ENGINES+1
comment: Provide 7 points of energy per engine

name: ENH ENGINES+2
comment: Provide 9 points of energy per engine

comment: Shows sectors in a 6x6 grid centered on U

name: ENH SCANNER+2

name: NUKE
comment: Kills 100 PEOPLE in a COLONY

comment: You are alerted as to passing ships
